amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Securities and Exchange Commission from proposing or implementing a rule that mandates the use of universal proxy ballots during proxy contests.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the Securities and Exchange Commission from proposing or implementing a rule that mandates the use of universal proxy ballots during proxy contests.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 180 (Roll no. 380).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 180 (Roll no. 380).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Garrett.
